thread.section_title: Wilson Amplifiers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wilson Amplifiers | wilsonamplifiers.com
thread.title: BJB-Texas

author: BJB-Texas
title: BJB-Texas
text: Received advice and recommendations that were most helpful. It was also very helpful to read reviews that have been posted. Signal increased to two bars or better. Pizza pan on top of fiberglass RV works(to attach magnetic antenna). Highly recommend WeBoost Drive 4G-X used with Wilson 311155 (inside antenna). Standard little antenna(outside) that comes with 4G-X mounted to 16" metal pizza pan works well in my situation.
